223b8(rgyud 'grel): zla ba ji bzhin lhan skyes spro// rkang pa gsum pas de nyid kyi khyad par gsungs te/ ldum ra'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni stong pa gsum pa la gnyen po ste/ zla ba shar ba zhes ye shes kyi zla ba'i dkyil 
224a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de shar bar gyur pa'o// de'i tshe nyon mongs pa'i mun pa gsal te bros pa'o// nam mkha' zhes pa ni ka ma bde ba kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems de yis gang gi yan lag tu gyur pa'o// 
224a2(rgyud 'grel): gu tsan zhes pa ni bzhi pa skye ba med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i gzugs bla ma'i drin gyis mchog gi rnal 'byor pas gnyis po gcig tu gyur pa yongs su rtog go/ de'i phyir rngon pa ni thugs rdo rje'o//

224b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma chen po dga' ba zhes so// de'i phyir sa bar ni sems kyi rdo rje'o// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yongs su btang nas nges par rig par gyur pa'o// de lta bur gyur pa ni thog ma dang mtha'

224b4(rgyud 'grel): lngas/ dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i mgon gyi gsung bsrubs pa las grub pa gang zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ dpal ldan de nyid bdud rtsi'i ro ru gyur pa rang la ston par byed pa'i mthar gnas pa/ dpal ldan de 
224b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid dpung nyen kyang ni rtag tu yang dag bsdus pa rnam par spyod pa rnams// bsdus pa de la rnam par dpyod byed pa// nye bar bsdus pa spyod pa'i gru brgya la// sems can rnams kyis byang chub 
224b6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i phyir// blo gros dang ldan rnams kyis dad mdzod mdzad// de phyed thub pa byin gyis rnam dpyad nas// slob mas yang dag rtogs pa bya phyir dang / kun gyis kyang ni shes par bya ba'i phyir// 
224b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzod kyi don ni rab tu gsal bar mdzad// skyes bu dam pa bshes rnams la// thub pas byin gyis 'grel mdzad pa'i// bdag gis bsod nams gang de yis// skyes bu dam pa rgyal gyur cig/ spyod 
224b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i glu'i mdzod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu kho na nyid gsal ba bshes pa'i skye bo rnams la slob dpon thub pas byin gyis 'grel pa mdzad pa las grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu 'grel pa dang bcas pa rdzogs 
225a1(rgyud 'grel): so// paN+Di ta chen po k+She rtini tsan+da'i zhal snga nas gdams pa dang bcas pa legs par zhus shing / chos kyi rje dpal ldan sa skya ba khu dpon rnams kyi sku drin la brten nas ba la yul yam bu'i 
225a2(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer du bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ro// // zug rgya bzhi dngas pa'i gnas phyogs bsgom pa bzugs so/ @#// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag rgya bzhi pa las kyi 
225a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po'o// de la las kyi phyag rgya ni/ bud med de lo bcu gnyis sam/ bcu drug gam/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi ma'o// de yang yul 
225a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su skyes pa/ dbang po tshang pa gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes pa/ dbang bskur thob pa/ sgom pa dang bzlas pa shes pa/ sngags las skyes pa/ slob lam dag pa/ sngags kyi nus pa dang ldan 
225a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ye shes las skyes pa'o// de yang a ba d+hU tI'i ring po 'am/ a ba d+hA tAM ston pa'i nus pa can/ dung can ma dang / pad+ma can dang / ri bong can dang / ri dgas can no// de ni sems ting nge 'dzin 
225a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yang rung / mi ldan pa yang rung ste/ bde ba skyes pa nas/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las/ bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags zhes slob dpon nA gA rdzu nas gsungs pa'o// de la chos kyi phyag 
225a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni/ yid kyi mngon sum gyi yul gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang / sgra snyan pa dang / dri zhim pa dang / ro yid du 'ong ba dang / reg yid du 'ong ba ste/ doni du phyi rol du ma brtags pa shes pa'i snang
225a8(rgyud 'grel): ba tsam ste/ de la dang po dga' ba dang / mchog dge'i lus kyi bde ba dang / phyi nas yid bde ba lhan cig skye dga' ste/ de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang lhan cig skyes 
225b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' 'byung ngo // de'i steng du lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po snang stong gnyis med bsgom mo// de la skyon dga' bral du 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de la bzhi ste/ gtum mo 'byed 'dzums 
225b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / gtum mo mar me gso ba dang / gtum mo srub shing gi 'khor lo dang gdum mo ba swa'i bu ga bsgom pa'o// de la dang po ni spu mtshams nas lte ba'i bar du mar me sor brgyad pa zhig bsams nas/ 
225b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i lam 'byed 'dzums byed pa'o// gnyis pa mar me gso ba ni spra mtshams nas lta bar phyin pas lte ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pas gso ba'o// gsum pa ni a ba d+hU tI bsrub shing la la nA 
225b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ra sa nA lte ba khrag gi theg le las 'bar ba sa snying ga'i byang chub kyi sems zhu nas bde ba chen po bsgom mo// bzhi pa ba spu'i bu ga ni lte ba'i dbus su bu ga phra mo 'khyil pa bsgoms la steng gi rlung mnan par 
225b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de ltar bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i tshes chu la thim pas du ba lta bu mthong ba dang / chu me la thim pas smig rgya lta bu mthong ba dang / me rlung la thim pas srin bu me khyer lta bu mthong ba 'byung ba dang / rlung rnam 
225b6(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa la thim pas nam mkha' lta bu 'byung ba dang / rnam par shes pa rtog pa yin te/ nam mkha' mi rtog pa la thim pas na/ nam mkha' stong pa lta bu'i rtags 'byung ngo // de la phyag rgya chen po bsgom 
225b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ rgya dgus gdab par bya'o// gzung ba med de rang gi snang ba yin pas rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'i bde ba chen po dang / 'dzin pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas mi bskyod pa'i rgyas
225b8(rgyud 'grel): btab pa dang / sems rang rig gnyis med par yang mi bsam ste/ bde ba chen por lhun gyis grub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btab pa dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / 
226a1(rgyud 'grel): sgom par byed pa dang / sgom pa po ro gcig pa gnyis su med pa'i rgyas gdab pa dang / sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang rjes ro gcig par ro mnyam pa'i bde ba chen pos rgyas gdab pa dang / 
226a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis 'od gsal ba'i ngang du rgyas gdab pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten dang btsud kyi 'jig rten brngan pa dang g.yo ba rnams he ru ka la rol pas rgyas gdab pa'o// de ltar rgya 
226a3(rgyud 'grel): dgus snod bcud kun bde stong gnyis kyis rgyas bdab/ sems ni 'od gsal rgya mtsho las// glo bur rba rlabs tshul du brtag/ sems ni nam mkha' stong pa las// glo bur sprin gyi tshul du brtag/ 
226a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom du med po ldan grub bsgom// rtog pa'i dra ba dang gis stong // mngon sum tshad mas mthong bzhid// shes bya rnal ma yin par gsal// rtog pa thams cad 'gog pa dang // mi nog ye shes 
226a5(rgyud 'grel): ngang la gzhag/ bsgom du med pa bsgom pa yin// ldan gyis grub pa bsgom pa yin// rnam par rtog pa med pa la// rnam nog med pa'i sgro mi gdags// dngos po gdod nas gnyis med la// 
226a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ces bya bsam mi bya// bad chen sgros skur bral ba la// bral lo snyam du bsams na skyon// zhams myong 'od gsal dag pa la// dag go zhes kyang rlom mi bya// rlom sems med pa gnas 
226a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshe// rtog pa rang gi ngang gis 'gag/ chos dang gang zag bdag med ces// rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te// rtog pa'i rang bzhin 'od gsal bar// shes na de tshe zhing na 'gag/ gnyen po'i rgyal po 
226a8(rgyud 'grel): mngon sum yin// gcig dang du bral gtan tshigs rnams// 'od gsal shes na dgos pa med// glang po dngos su rnyed gyur nas// glang po'i rjes ni tshol byed dam// bde chen der snang mngon sum la// 
226b1(rgyud 'grel): lus dang rjes dpag btsal mi dgos// myong ba dngos po'i gshis yin pas// chad par lta ba'i dogs pa med// gangal de'o mi sems pas// sgro 'dogs pa yi dogs pa med// snod bcud 
226b2(rgyud 'grel): bde chen rgyas gdab pas// nyon mongs dgralas ldang dogs med// las la byed do bya'o zhes// dge sdig gang la'ang mi sems shing // rmi lam la sa la khyad med pas// ngan song gsum gyi dogs 
226b3(rgyud 'grel): pa med// gang dang gang la sems pa na// bde chen der sdang ngo shes na// gzhan po gzhan zhig btsal mi dgos// bya ba btang ba'i sems nyid ni// lhun gyis grub par rnam par gnas// ji ltar chu 
226b4(rgyud 'grel): la chu gzhag dang // ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du// rang gis rang gi ye shes ni// legs mthong gang yin 'di phyag yin// de nyid gnyis med mchod pa yi// gnyen po stong nyid lta ba 'di// sdig pa 
226b5(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa'i mchog yin te// me dang grang ba'i reg pa bzhin// bde stong mngon sum 'di dang 'gal// rjes su yi rang la sogs dang // chos spyod sdom pa'i nang nas kyang // don dam byang chub sems 
226b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di mchog/ stong nyid mngon sum mthong ste mchog/ dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bzlas brjod kyi// nang na bde chen dkyil 'khor mchog/ gang dang gang la blo gzhag pa// de dang de ni bde chen du// shes na 
226b7(rgyud 'grel): mal cha stan dag dang // g.yog 'khor gnyen bshes snang ba kun// bde chen shes pa bsgoms pas mchog/ snod ni gzhal yas khang yin la// bcud ni lha dang lha mo yin// 'gro ba ris drug bde 
226b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs drug/ dmyal ba'i 'jig rten bde ba can// yi dgas dud 'gro bde chen gyi// ngang du shes pa lha yi sku// sems la bkag pa med pa nyid// gnyen po mchog tu kho yis mthong // dper na 
227a1(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam gnas skabs na// bde dang sdug bsngal snang ba kun// sad par gyur pa ro gcig ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i bde sdug kun// skye med dang du mnyam pas na// rnal 'byor sems
227a2(rgyud 'grel): la blang dor med// dgra sdang rmi lam 'drar shes nas// chags sdang gnyen po bsgom mi dgos// sems kyi rang bzhin yongs shes na// chos nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos// dus gsum khams gsum
227a3(rgyud 'grel): tha snyad du// bems po blo bur yin shes na// sems kyi rang bzhin bcos mi dgos// skye 'gag nam mkha'i skra shad bzhin// snga phyi skye bas stong pas na// ma skyes zhes su bsgom pa med// rgyal ba'i
227a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs bzhi rtog med la// skye ba med pa zhes su bsgrags// gnyen po spang bya dbyer med kyi// don la bya ba tsal med pa nyid// btang snyoms chen po bsgom pa'i mchog/ dper na mi dga' brtson 
227a5(rgyud 'grel): byas na// de la 'bad rtsol gyis 'bros la// de nyid btson par btang nas ni// 'bad rtsol med par gnas pa bzhin// nyon mongs 'bad pas bkag kyang ni// ched kar 'byung bar 'gyur ba la// de nyid
227a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid lcags bkrol nas// yul la rang dga' btang na ni// rang gi rang gi rtog med skye// des na thabs la mkhas pa yin// 'bras bu lam du byed par gsungs// blun po yod med sdug bsngal 
227a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang // gdod nas skye ba ma myong la// mkhas pa 'gag pa sems la med// ched dkar gnyen po bsgom mi dgos// rnal 'byor nang du kha bltas la// sems las ma gtogs myong med pas// snang srid 
227a8(rgyud 'grel): rtag dang mi rtag la// bkag pa dang ni sgrub pa med// sems kyang ye shes yin shes na// mya ngan 'das pa bstan mi dgos// gal te chags sdang skyes gyur kyang // gnyen po mi sdug byams sogs ni// 'gro/ 
227b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang // ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings su thim pa ltar// dang po 'od gsal glo bur bcas// phyis ni rang gi ngang 'gags na// gnyen po dag ni su la 
227b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// mi rig 'khrul pa'i bag chags kyis// sems la smig rgyu bzhin snang na// mi mkhas smig rgyu 'chos pa bzhin// gnyen po bsgom pa kye re 'tshar// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// 
227b3(rgyud 'grel): skye ba nyid kyang mi brtan na// glo bur brtags par ga la 'gyur// de bas gnyen po me bsgom ste// gnyen po med cing bsgom pa'ang med// mtshan mar mi 'dzin rnal 'byor pa// 'di dang 'di 'ga' sems 
227b4(rgyud 'grel): pa med// 'grib ma med cing 'gag pa med// 'du mi byed pa nam mkha' 'dra// 'du shes las byung ting 'dzin skyon// 'du mi byed ces sems pa med// mngon sum rtog bral rgyun bsrings nas// 
227b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms so zhes su tha snyad 'dogs// rtog med ye nas skyen yang // sgro 'dogs sel ba bsgom pa yin// bcos med rang gsal ma byas na// nan gyis mi rtog bsgoms gyur kyang // mi rtog pa nyid 
227b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa'i rgyu// dper na sman nyid ma zhu na// nad kyi nang na de nyid lci// 'bad med bsgoms la sgro 'dogs gcad ces bya// sgyu ma chu zla bzhin du shes med na// stong zhes brjod pas sems la yongs mi 
227b7(rgyud 'grel): 'go/ sems kyi rang bzhin snang stong rtogs na ni// 'gro ba rnams la snying rje ngang gis skye// bdag dang gzhan dag dbye ba med par yang // chu yi zla ba lta bu blo ni skye 'gyur na// bde ba chen po bsgom zhes de la 
227b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// gang zhig b+ha gar bde ba rtog med myong // gang zhig me long gzugs brnyan snang ba dang // gang zhig gtum mo drod las bde myong dang // gang zhig rgod dang lho dang lag bcangs dang // 'o byas 'khrud pa 
228a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dam pa myong // rtog med myong bar gyur kyang bde chen gyis// rgyas ma btab na byang chub med do zhes// rdo rjes 'chang ba gsung zhing tshad mas grub// bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rgyas gdab 
228a2(rgyud 'grel): bya// rgyas gdab ces bya'i don gyi ngo bo yang // dmigs pa'i yul la chu mar ma zad kyi// rang gi myong ba sgyu mar mngon sum du// rig pa de la rgyas gdab rjes su brjod// rtog pa re res bcas pa rgyas 
228a3(rgyud 'grel): btab ma ni// de bzhin rjes dpag bsgom pa rgyas btab med// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor spros dang bral ba yi// mngon sum der snang rgya yi rnam par byung // des na rgyas gdab ces ni bya bar bshad// 'jig 
228a4(rgyud 'grel): rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol dag/ bde chen mnyam par shes te bsgoms pas na// mda' ka'i man ngag gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// sems kyi rang bzhin chos kyi skur shes na// 'bras bu thob bya 
228a5(rgyud 'grel): gsar du btsal ba med// sems kyi ngang las 'phel 'grib med shes na// bsgom pa shor yang spogs pa btsal mi dgos// legs byas nyes byas glo bur yin shes na// dam tshig nyams chags 
228a6(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa de nyid yin// ji ltar snang ba de ltar bden// ji ltar btags pa de ltar med// ji ltar btsal ba de ltar skyon// ji ltar bsams pa de ltar bral// yul ni gang dang gang dag la// rtog bral 
228a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba skyes gyur na// de tshe 'o ma'i sems nyid la// de ni stong nyid bsgom pa yin// rang rig gnyis med bsgom bya zhes// gang la gdams ngag phog gyur kyang // gnyis med nyid du ma myong na// gang 
228a8(rgyud 'grel): zhig bstan kyang ming du zad// yul ni gang dang gang dag la// thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas// nang gri bdag nyid g.yo med par// gnas pa mig gi gzugs dag gi/ gnas pa rna bas sgra 
228b1(rgyud 'grel): dag gam// gnas pa sna yi dri dag gam// gnas pas lce yi ro dag gam// gnas pas lus kyi reg dag gam// gnas pa yid kyi tshes dag la// shes pa'i blo de rtog bral yin// rtog pa'i skye
228b2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'gag pa dang // rang rig nyid kyis myong bas na// rtog dang bral bas sngon du grub// gang zhig rtog bral don de la// tshor ba bde ba la brten nas// bsgoms pas pho nya'i lam du gyur// gang la dang 
228b3(rgyud 'grel): po rtog med la// dga' ba zhes su bshad pa yin// rtog bral bde chen gnyis pa la// mchog dga' zhes su bshad pa yin// de ni lus kyi bde ba ste// yid 'ong yul las byung ba'o// rtog dang // 
228b4(rgyud 'grel): bral ba gsum pa ni// lhan cig skyes dga' zhes bshad de// yid kyi mngon sum bde ba yin// gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral bas// myong ba gsal ba skye ba ni// rang rig bde chen zhes su bshad// 
228b5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig rtog pas sar bcad na// dga' ba de'i ting 'dzin nyams 'gyur bas// phyag rgya bzhi yi yul rnams las// tshor ba bde ba skyes gyur pas// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i stobs ldan pas// rtog dang 
228b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas skye mi 'gyur// de bas bde ba'i ting 'dzin las// rnal 'byor pa yi yid bzhag nas// gnyis med bde chen bsgom par bya// gang zhig bde ba'i ting 'dzin las// sems 'dzeg pa ni 
228b7(rgyud 'grel): zhi gnas yin des na dga' dang mchog dga' dang // lhan skyes dga' ba phul byung yang // zhi gnas sems las mi 'da' ste// lus dang yid kyi bde bar zad// bde chen don gyis rgyas gdab na// 
228b8(rgyud 'grel): lhag mthong phul du byung bar 'gyur// gang zhig bde ba'i chos can la// stong nyid bsgrub pa gang yin pa// lhan cig skyes dga' yin snyam ste// de ni rjes dpag bsgom pa'i lam// so sor rtog pa'i 
229a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor te// bde ba chen po myong ba'ang med// 'od gsal bde ba'i rgya mtsho las// dga' ba de rba rlabs tshul du shes// de nyid stong pa bsgom pa yin// bde dang yid bde 
229a2(rgyud 'grel): gang yin las// de yi rang bzhin stong shes pa// gtan tshigs la sogs don med yin// chu ni dang par gyur pa la// nya dag myur du 'phar bltar// de bzhin stong gsal rang bzhin las// sna tshogs / 
229a3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa ldang zhing 'gag/ snod bcud bde chen rgyas btab pas// sems kyi glang po yan btang yod // gnas ma rnyed nas ldog par 'gyur// dngos po gsar pa mthong na yang // de de bde bas rgyas btab 
229a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// g.yeng ba nyid kyang g.yeng ba med// spyod lam ro mnyam min shes nas// 'gro ba nyid ni 'gro 'ong med// rgyu 'bras med kyang rgyas btab pas// skye ba nyid na'ang skye ba med// 'gag pa thim pa'i 
229a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas btab pas// bkag tsam zhid na'ang 'gag pa med// bde gshegs rnams ni bde chen nyid kyi sku// chos rnams thams cad bde gshegs nyid dang mnyam// byis pa'i blo can dngos la zhen pa rnams// 
229a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rtog pas brtag pa nyid la spyod// dngos rnams thams cad bcos su med na yang // grub mtha' ngan pas bslad pas 'chos par byed// gdod nas rnam dag 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings// bde 
229a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs chos kyi sku yis mkhyen par mazham// 'khor ba'i phung po sgyu mar rnam dag shes// longs spyod rdzogs sku sku mar yang dag mnyam// gal te sgyu ma'i rgyun la bde sdug dang // dga' dang gdung ba'i skye 
229a8(rgyud 'grel): brag yod min yang // der snang skad cig re rer gnas pa las// bde chen bde ba chen po nyid du gcig/ rnam par rtog pa tha dad med na yang // mi rtog dang las ro cig gyur par snang // dang po'i las can so so'i/ 
229b1(rgyud 'grel): skye bo la// bde ba lam du byed par gsungs na yang // gang zhig bla ma'i phan pa'i lung thob nas// bde sdug thams cad bde ba chen por 'gyur// gang zhig sdong nyid mi shes pa// de lta thar pa'i skal pa 
229b2(rgyud 'grel): med// 'gro drug srid pa'i btson ra ru// rmongs pa de ni 'khyam par 'gyur// de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas na// blo ni gzhan don la dga' bar// 'gyur ba zhid du the tshom 
229b3(rgyud 'grel): med// sems can gang yin thams cad sngon// pa ma mdza' bshes rtsa lag tu// gyur cing phan chen btags pas na// byas pa gzo ba nyid du bya// sems can la brten bla med pa'i// sangs rgyas go/ 
229b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phang nyid 'thob na// tshangs dbang drag po 'jig rten skyong // sogs pa 'thob pa mtshar ci che// sems can phan pa byas tsam gyis// 'gro ba gsum pa dam par skye// sems can gnod pas sdug 
229b5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal ni// rnam pa du ma'i tshul dag gis// dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro ru// sems can rnams ni nye bar spyod// dngos po kun gyis mgu bya ba// rang lus bzhin du bsrung bar bya// 'bad pas 
229b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can mi dga' ba// dug dang 'dra bar spa bar bya// sems can yongs su ma btang bas// sangs rgyas byang chub kun tu 'thob// gzhan gyi gnod pa ma bzod pas// mnar med du yang skye bar 
229b7(rgyud 'grel): byed// rang gi lus dang nor sbyin pa// 'di ni mtshar zhing 'di ni bsngags// 'di ni 'jug pa mchog yin no// mtshar zhes bya ba 'di min te// chos 'di stong par shes nas su// las kyi 'bras bu bsten 
229b8(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// mtshar ba bas kyang 'di mtshar zhing // ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ro// sems can bskyab pa'i bsam pa 'dis// srid pa'i 'dam du skyed mos kyi// pad+ma la ni chu bzhin du// srid pa'i skyon 
230a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis de ma gos// bzang po la sogs rgyal ba'i sras// 'di na ye shes me yis ni// nyon mongs bud shing bsregs bzhin du// 'on kyang thugs rjes bslabs pa mdzad// byang chub che 
230a2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'chi dang ste// dur khrod gshegs dang dka' spyod mdzad// bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // lha yul gshegs dang mya ngan 'das// de bzhin khyim nas byung ba rnams// 
230a3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dbang gis 'jug pa yis// 'gro ba'i mgon po ston par mdzad// tshangs dbang nye dbang drag sogs kyis// gzugs kyis rab tu 'jug mdzad cing // 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sbyor ba yis// thugs 
230a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes thugs kyis rol pa mdzad// theg pa gnyis pa dag kyang ni// theg pa chen por blang bas na// srid pa'i lam gyis dub pa rnams// ral bas don de de nyid min// nyan thos de dag de srid du/ 
230a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma bskul bar// de srid ye shes lus gcig gis// ting 'dzin dregs pas myos te gnas// bskul nas sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni// sems can don la dga' byed cing // 
230a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams ye shes nyer 'phel nas// sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// bag chags las ni byung bas na// bag chags sa bon dag tu bshad// bag chags rjes mthong tshogs pa na// srid 
230a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i myu gu de bskyed do// stong nyid smra bas smra byed cing // rtag tu lus ngag yid gsum gyis// 'di ltar sems can don byed pa// chad par smra ba yod ma yin zhes gsungs so// dper na gser 'gyur 
230a8(rgyud 'grel): zangs lcags thams cad la// gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa'i thabs rnyed na// thams cad kha dog gser du 'gyur ba ltar// sems kyang bde chen dang du ro gcig 'gyur// sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer 
230b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rtog dang bral ba'i stong pa'i rnam pa skyes// de bzhin skya 'drar sems kyi sku 'drang shes// bde chen rgyas btab bdag byin brlab pa la// sgyu ma'i dpe yi don rnams btsal mi dgos// thams cad sku 
230b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra mi 'drar dgag sgrub byed// phyag rgya'i lam la bde ba stong par shes// chos kyi mdo don sems kyi stong par shes// chos rnams kun la yod med dgag sgrub med// rtog med mngon sum lam la blo gzhag
230b3(rgyud 'grel): pas// rtags kyis rjes 'brangs gzhan sel dgos pa med// dus gsum bde gshegs ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar// gang du kha bltas sems kyi gsang shes pas// sgrib pa kun zad ye shes phun tshogs 
230b4(rgyud 'grel): shing // sangs rgyas zhing grol sems can thams cad sgrol// thams cad bzang rgyu nyid du gyur par nges// ji ltar sbrul gyi rang bzhin shes pa na// de yi dug ni gnod par mi 'gyur te// gang zhig nyon mongs 
230b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i rang bzhin shes// des ni de ma thag tu des grol 'gyur// de nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas shing // de nyid kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// bde chen lam la brten nas ni// thams cad byas kyang rnam par grol// / 
230b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs shing // gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas// ye shes 'dus ma byas pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa'o// shI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs spangs pa yin// du ni 
230b7(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa dang bral ba// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa// sems kyi ngang la rnam gnas na// mya ngan 'das pa bstan du med// bde chen rtog pa'i man ngag 'di// sdeb sbyor go rim bsgrigs pa min// nyams myong rtog
230b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phan pa'i lung // dam pa'i spyi bos blang bar mdzod// dngos po'i gnas lugs bsgom pa zhes bya ba// nor bu gling pa'i slob dpon bde ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // mi gus dad med brtson chung gtum// 
231a1(rgyud 'grel): blan zhing log lnga skur 'debs la// zab po'i don bstan gnyis 'bur 'gyur// des na zab mo gsang bar gsungs/ []9 sargya gas / @#// rgya gar skad du/ tsa durmu drA 
231a2(rgyud 'grel): u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya bzhi'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med cing // zab cing rang bzhin brtag dka' ba// phyag rgya chen po'i 
231a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid// phyag 'tshal nas ni de nyid bshad// de la man ngag la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas thog mar grub mtha' dag shes par bya ste/ de yang theg pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/ nyan thos kyi theg 
231a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po'o// de nyid gnas pa bzhi ste bye brag tu smra bar gnas pa dang / mdo sde par gnas pa dang / rnam par rig par gnas pa dang / dbu mar gnas 
231a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de dag nyid sbyor ba dgu ste/ nyan thos rab 'bring gsum dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde pa dang / rnam bcas dang / rnam med dang / sgyu ma lta bu gnyis su med par smra ba'i dbu ma dang / chos
231a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu mi gnas par smra ba'i dbu ma'o// de dag re re la yang dpyad pa'i sgo dang / bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi dri ma dang / lta ba ste bzhi bzhi'o// de la dpyad pa ni thos bsam la brten 
231a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang gi so sor rtog pa'i shes rab po// bsam gtan ni rang gi bsgom pa'i shes rab po// bsam gtan gyi dri ma ni de'i dngos su mi mthun pa'i phyogs so// lta ba ni rang gi spyod pa la rang gi shes rab 
231a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis zin pa'i khyad par dang / rang gi 'bras bu la blos yul du byed pa'o// de la nyan thos tha ma'i spyod pa ni// sngon po la sogs pa'i don khas len pa sngon du 'gro bas brjod du med pa'i gang zag 'dod pa'o// / 
231b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bring po ni de dang mthun pa'o// rab ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su shes pas gang zag stong par lta ba'o// rang rgyal ni gzung ba stong zhing 'dzin pa khas len pa'o// mdo sde pa ni gzung ba 'dus
231b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod cing 'dzin po chegs drug go/ rnam bcas ni thams cad shes pa'i rnam par 'dod pa ste/ sna tshogs gnyis su med par 'dod pa'o// rnam med ni 'di dag thams cad sems nyid de/ rnam pa
231b3(rgyud 'grel): med par rig pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa'o// sgyu ma lta bu ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yang dag pa'i dngos pos stong pa ste/ de nyid gnyis su med par 'dod pa'o// rab tu mi gnas pa ni tha snyad thams cad ni/ 
231b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa tsam ste/ don gyi ngo bo tsar yang mi gnas pa'o// zhes dpyod pa'o// bsam gtan ni mi sdug pa bsgom pa dang / srog dang rtsol ba 'grang ba la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi bden pa mar me
231b5(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa lta bu ci yang mi snang ba la sems gnas pa dang / sna'i rtse mor gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor bsdus nas sems gnas pa dang / sems kyi rnam pa la sems gnas pa dang / rnam pa med pa la
231b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dang / gzugs brnyan la gnas pa dang / cir yid ma grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'o// de las sems kyi rnam pa la gnas par bya ba ni dang por cir yang rung ba la shes pa gad// de nyid sems
231b7(rgyud 'grel): tsam du shes par byas de gnas pa'o// rnam pa med pa la gnas pa ni thog par mchod pa la sogs pa byas te/ slob ma bstan la gzhag la dbugs sor bcug ste/ thog mar me tog lta bu la shes pa gtod 
231b8(rgyud 'grel): du bcug nas lag pa spyi bor gzhag la sngags 'di brjod do// oM a ra ra hUM hUM/ oM badz+ri yi gi ni a b+hi tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ces pa'i mgor rang gi yi dam gyi sngags brjod de/ de nas me tog kyang med par 
232a1(rgyud 'grel): byas na mur du skye'o// bsam gtur gyi dri ma rnams dang / lta ba rnams ni gzhan nas gsal bas 'dir ma brjod do// de ltar na mi mkhas pa rab rib can dang / mkhas pa rab rib 
232a2(rgyud 'grel): can dang / mkhas pa rab rob med pa'o// de dag gi snying rje yang sems can la dmigs pa/ chos la dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o// de la gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa gsum las
232a3(rgyud 'grel): ni theg pa chen po'o// gnas pa ni phyi ma gnyis so// sbyor ba ni tha ma bzhi la'o// de la slob dpon nyid kyi gzhung gis ni rab du mi gnas par sbyor ba'o// de lta na yang de dang thams cad du khyad med pa ni ma yin te// 
232a4(rgyud 'grel): ji skad du don gcig na yang marmongs dang thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang / dbang po rnon pos dbang byas phyir// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phagos// zhes gsungs pas de brjod par bri ste/ b+ha bskyed pa'i 
232a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa dang / zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa'o// yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dpung dang / rdo rje 'chang gi 
232a6(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dpung ba'o// yang kun brtags la gzhan dbang gi rgya dang / gzhan dbang lo yongs su grub pa dang / yongs su grub pa la rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de nyid la bde ba chen po'i rgyas gdab pa'o// yang 
232a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi las rtogs par bya ste/ las kyi phyag rgya ni zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// chos kyi phyag rgya ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// phyag rgya chen po ni ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa'o// 
232a8(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// kun brtags la gzhan dbang gi rgya ni bri bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// yongs su grub pa'i rgya ni lha thams cad kyang rnam par rig pa tsam mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan 
232b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam rig stong pa nyid du shes pa'o// bde ba chen po'i rgya ni de nyid man ngag nyams su myong bar byas pa'o// las kyi phyag rgya ni dbang gis ngo bo ste// de yang bum pa dang / gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi 
232b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bum pa ni slob dpon gyi dbang man bcad de/ lus dag par byed pa'o// gsang ba ni thabs shes rab gnyis las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ster ba ste/ ngag dag par byed pa'o// shes rab ye shes

232b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // mchog tu dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o zhes gsungs pas so// 'on te lung las lhan cig skyes pa tha mar yod do zhe na/ yang bden mod kyi/ de ni bla ma//

232b8(rgyud 'grel): ba ni go rim dang don gnyis ka la mi mkhas pa'o// da ni dbang bskur ngan pa brjod par bya ste/ 'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa phyi rol gyi bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs te dga' ba'o// bsrub pa dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba ni 
233a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par smin pa ste mchog dga'o// rin po cher nyams su myong ba ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba ste lhan cig skyes pa'o// pad+mar ldang ba ni rnam par nyed pa ste dga' bral lo// zhes 'dod pa ste mu steg 
233a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang khyad med pa'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyams su myong ba la yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// de ni go rim la mkhas kyang don la mi mkhas pa'o// da ni dbang bskur bzang po brjod par bya ste/ 'di'i lugs 
233a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis dga' ba bzhi ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ phyi rol gyi bya ba nas bskyod pa'i mthar thug pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba'o// rin po che'i mthar thug pa nyams su myong ba ni rnam par smin pa ste mchog

236a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa dang / brgyad pa'i man rig dang / rlung rig pa'i mdon sum gyis shin du phra ba'i/ skad cig gis gsum pa la lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' brnyed pa ni/ yang dag pa'i dbang la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 
236a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rnal 'byor chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las/ mun pa la ni mar me ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa/ gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i nges pa'i tshig tu gzhag pa/ pa 
236a4(rgyud 'grel): rol du phyin pa'i theg pa las thabs khyad par du gyur pa/ skal pa dang ldan pa'i spyod yul/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang / dam pa dang po dang / zla gsang thig le la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'o// de ltar de/ 
236a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bzhi pa yang zhes 'byung bas/ sgrub pa'i thabs dang / grub pa'i rang bzhin yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o// zhes zer ro// shes rab kyi ye shes dbang dag gi spyir khyab pa'i man ngag/ phyag rgya 
236a6(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar brtag pa dang / la sa ga rim dang / rnam pa dang / da pe dang / gnas dang / badz+ra dang / sna'i rim pa gang thob pa la sogs pa ni/ bdag gis gsal bar shes med kyi/ 'dir brjod pa'i dgas 
236a7(rgyud 'grel): pa med do// de ltar yang dag pa'i dbang la mkhas pas ni/ btsan thabs dang / dbang la mi mkhas pa'i gzhung dag lung rigs kyi mche bas 'joms par nus pa dang / thabs kyi theg pa'i lus su gyur pa'i
236a8(rgyud 'grel): phyir// glang po che dang brda'o zhes bstod pa'o// thabs gang zhe na/ brdzun pa'i lam gyis bslus te/ yang dag pa'i lam la sbyar ba'o// gang bslu ba zhe na/ theg pa gzhan las yangs pa dang / gzhan nas/ 
236b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa dang / tha mal pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa'o// ji ltar slu zhe na/ dang po gsum ni sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa gtong ba'i nyes pa med pas/ spyod yul dngos la sbyor ba 'am/ yang na slob 
236b2(rgyud 'grel): dpon dang / 'gal na/ thabs gzhan gyis bzung ste/ re zhig dben pa'i yul las pi bzlog par ci rigs pa'i sgrar bstan pa'o// tshangs par spyod pa ni de dang chos mthun pa'i thobs gzhan gyis bzung ste/

236b7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i man ngag gzhan yod par kha 'phangs pa'i phyir ro// mdor na yang dag par dpyad na/ phyag rgya chen po'i don mi shes par/ las kyi phyag rgya la lam du mthong ba mtha' dag/ phyi rol mu stegs pa dang / bdud// 
236b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs pa dag yin par mngon te/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni ma skyes pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ brjod du med pa zhes tshig tu brjod kyang / las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu la nges par bltos pa'i phyir/ don de nyid// 
237a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i rnam par 'dod par shes te/ dper na log sred can dag bag ma len par byed pa bzhin no// 'di ltar zhi ba pa dang tshor ba'i gzhung las kyang / lha dang lha mo mi phyed sbyor// bde ba

241a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa ru mi 'gyur te// gzhon nu ma ni gzhan dag dang // 'dus pas bde ba bskyed pa yin// shes bya shes bya rnam zad pa// snyoms par 'jug ces brjod pa yin// skye ba med pa gang yin pa// de ni khu ba'i// 
241a8(rgyud 'grel): sgrar bshad de// snying rje gang su 'thung ba dang // dam tshig rnams ni skyong ba dang // bla med ye shes thob gyur pa// de ni ka pA la zhes brjod// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes su bshad// 
241b1(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / yang sngags kyi bzlas pa med cing dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med/ de la dkyil 'khor med cing dkyil 'khor can yang med// de ni sngags bzlas te dka' thub dang de 
241b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg/ de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ mdor sdus nas ni sems 'dus po yi tshul can no// zhes 'byung ngo // de lta bu'i lung zhung zhing mi gsal la rab du mthong ba des na rgyud nas rdo rje'i 
241b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig du zin pa zhes bya'o// mdor na de nyid chos thams cad kyi zab pa dang / rgya che ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pas/ lta ba ma lus pa'i gzhi 'am/ lung thams cad kyi 'byung gnas sam/ rig pa thams cad kyi 
241b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid ces bya'o// rigs pa'i ye shes rang las shar ba 'am/ sgrib pa'i mun pa ma lus par sel bas/ rnal 'byor gyi nyi zla zhes bya'o// dngos po rnams kyi mtha' 'am don gyi gting mthong bar byed 
241b5(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje'i mig ces bya'o// chos thams cad kyi 'babs 'am ro gcig tu sdud pas lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtsho dang ba zhes bya'o// thams cad kyi khongs nas gnas pa 'am/ ma lus par sreg par nus 
241b6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ lhan cig skyes pa'i gtum mo zhes bya'o// mtshan ma rnams kyi srog 'gog pa'am bus po nye bar 'jigs pa'i gnas yin pas/ mthar thug pa'i dur khrod ces bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub kyi sem 
241b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul nas thams cad mnyam pa dang / rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa'i rkyen gyis sems can dang sangs rgyas yon tan mi mnyam pa ni zla ba'i dpes shes par bya'o// don la thams cad mnyam pa yang 
241b8(rgyud 'grel): dpe de nyid kyis shes par bya'o// des don gyi man ngag bstan cing thob pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin cig car yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni// rgyal po'i/ 
242a1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i dpes shes par bya'o// yang don la yon tan yang cig car du ldan pa'ang dpe de nyid kyis shes par bya'o// thams cad kyi mnyam pa'ang ma rtogs pa tsam gyis bsgribs te sdug
242a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal la spyod pa ni/ dbul po'i lus kyi nor bu/ rin po che'i dpes shes par bya'o// rang bzhin de rgyal bltos pa med pa la sogs pa dang / ma nor ba'i gdams ngag la rag las pa la sogs pa'ang dpe
242a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyis shes par bya'o// gzhan yang chos thams cad kyi rgya rkyen so sor ma 'dres pas byal ba ma yin pa dang rkyen gyis bskyed pas rang gi ngo bo yang dag par yod pa ma yin pas/ mu stegs la sogs 
242a4(rgyud 'grel): pa phyi rol pa dang mi 'dra ba ni/ sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpes shes par bya'o// don phyi nang dang bden brdzun la sogs pa gnyis med pa'ang dpe de nyid kyis shes par bya'o// mthar phyin pa'i man ngag 
242a5(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba yod pa dang / thams cad kyis rnyed par dka' ba dang / ji ltar rnyed pa'i don cig car ram rigs kyis bsten par bya ba dang / des thob pa'i yul la mi bslu ba ni mi dang lha'i sman bzang po dang / mchog
242a6(rgyud 'grel): gi bdud rtsi'i dpes shes par bya'o// cig car du 'jug pa kun gyi yul ma yin pa dang / don leg par rtogs na slar gnod par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yang dpe de nyid kyis shes par bya'o// de la sogs pa'i dpe 
242a7(rgyud 'grel): don gyi yan lag ma nor ba'i bshad pas/ don gyi snying po brgyan cing yid ches pa bstan par bya'o// 'dir bsdus te tshigs su bcad pa/ rin chen brtag phyir ka shaM ka'i rdo// shes ldan pa la pa yis gzhag 
242a8(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar// mu stegs sangs rgyas par mdo rtogs phyir// rten 'brel phyag rgya thub pas 'khor la gzhag/ lung gis dag byed rig pa bzang po ste// rigs pa bde skyed lung gi snang bar gsungs// lung rigs 
242b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang las don gyi snying po mthong // de las gzhan du nam yang srid pa min// thog mar bde gshegs yon tan mos par 'gyur// de 'og de 'grub rgyu yi cho se la mos// de 'og ston byed bla mal gus 'gyur// mthar 
242b2(rgyud 'grel): nirang sems dag la dga' dang skye// 'bar ba'i me dbus mA gu skabs med lngar// mi khom gnas su dal 'byor ji ltar 'thob// de phyir dge bcu'i rtag pa 'di bzang ste// mi dge las kyi rnam rtog nga lha min// lcags 
242b3(rgyud 'grel): dang gser las byas pa'i lu gu rgud// 'ching bar 'dra yang de gnyis khyad par che// de phyir lung las dus gsum dge ba'i tshig/ nga yi yin zhes kun la khyab par bstan// legs par gsungs pa'i dam chos 
242b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba las// mi rtag bdag med yul gyi dngos po la// yan lag dang bral dngos gzhi nyes med gsung // de phyir theg chen sngags kyi tshul du yang // dus gzhan gang zag gzhan dang yul gzhan dang / 
242b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs gzhan dang ni don gzhan dgongs pa yis// 'gal zhing 'gog pa cung zad ma gsungs te/ dge slong rdor 'dzin des na mchog tu gsungs// de phyir rgyud don dpag bsam shing dang ni// yid bzhin 
242b6(rgyud 'grel): nor dang bum pa bzang po ltar// sngags don rig pa'i bla ma rnams gsungs te// sen de'i sgra dang chom rkun sgra bzhin no// ji ltar sman mchog nad pa'i bye brag gis// 'ba' zhig dang ni 'dren mar byin pa yis// 
242b7(rgyud 'grel): zhu dang mazhu'i mthu yi khyad par snang // dam chos sman yang de 'drar bla ma gsungs// rang rig sku 'phrul bde ba chen po'i ngang // mi rig sgyu 'phrul sdug bsngal thog mtha' med// chos rnams thams cad sku 
242b8(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dra ba ste/ srid dang rnam grol gcig dang tha dad min// gzhan yang dpe ni rtogs pa'i dug tsam ste// yang dag tu na bcing ba gdi yang med// des na chos kun blo ldan cig shos la// grub dang sgrub pa 
243a1(rgyud 'grel): nga par nga ba bya ngang byasasams sa byangs sa sas sa sa sa nga nga nga nga nga nga nga bya sa ga nga sa nga tha ma nga bar rtsam mapasas nga bas pa sa pa yang bas ma nga 'a' ma mam 
243a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa de 'dir 'thad// ji ltar dpa' bo thogs med 'gro ba yang // dman pa'i don phyir ngal sor rim gyis 'jug/ de bzhin mkhas pa chags pa'i gnas med kyang // blo dman don phyir grub 
243a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' rim gyis skyong // de nyid brir na rnal 'byor chen pos kyang // thog mar dga' la don gyi snying po bstan// gdul bya dman gzigs phyi nas rim pa yang // du ma mdzad de yang dag bzhed mi ni gzung // blo yi 
243a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pas don gyi khyod par len// de las gzhan du skye bo 'dod rgyal gzhung // dang po'i las pas nyon mongs lam 'jug pa// bdud kyi sder gsungs thar cing grol ba med// bkres pa zhi phyir ring du rgyug pa dang / 
243a5(rgyud 'grel): skom pas bsal bu'i lan tshwa'i chu 'thung dang // smin par 'dod phyir pha ma gsod pa dang / bde ba 'dod phyir rang srog 'dor ba 'dra// mi bzed dug gis nad kun zhi byed par// sman pa'i mchog ste phal pa rnams 
243a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis min// 'bar ba me yis khrus kyi las byed pa// gtsang sbra can de ri dgas kun gyis min// ke ta ka zos lci ba sman 'gyur ba// spos kyi glang chen ba lang gzhan gyis min// snying rje'i mthu thob rang lus chags// 
243a7(rgyud 'grel): med dang / ting 'dzin dbang thob snang ba sgur nus dang // mnyam nyid gdeng thob 'khrul pa zil gnon pa'i// dam pas yul sprad grol te gzhan gyis min// de phyir snyigs ma'i dus 'dir slob ma yis// yang // / 
243a8(rgyud 'grel): dag bla ma btsal ba ched che ste// de log ni ni thams cad log par 'gyur// log pa'i lam gyi srid mtshor yun ring 'khyams// zhes bya ba'o// de ltar na chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mthar rtogs pas/ lam// 
243a9(rgyud 'grel): dang lam ma yin pa bye brag shin du byed pa dang theg pa gsum du phye yang don mi 'gal bar bstan pa khong du chud pas 'dren pa rnams kyi bstan pa la gus par yid ches pa dang / tshad ma gsum gyis chos rnams bdag/ 
243b1(rgyud 'grel): med par bstan la phebs pas don la thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes shing gdeng du gyur pa ni yang dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste/ 'joms byed seng ge bdag gi gzhung zhes bya ba'o// de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa'i ye 
243b2(rgyud 'grel): shes de kho na nyid rtogs shing nyams su len pa med par/ tha snyad tsam la brten nas/ rnal 'byor du mchis shing / log pa'i lam la 'jug pa ni/ phyin ci log gi g.yang sas bskor ba'i phyir rab tu yang nyam 
243b3(rgyud 'grel): da bar snang ngo // rgud las kyang / phyi ma'i dus kyi rnal 'byor spyod mang dag/ rkam zhing rab gtum ma bsdams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig la rab dga' rnal 'byor yo byad chags// rgyud chen 'di dang bzhi pa 'di 
243b4(rgyud 'grel): spong 'gyur// rgod cing dbang po g.yongs la brag dogs can// gnas la chags shing rnyed la 'dod pa dag/ sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag du gnas// bzhi pa 'di ni rab tu spang bar 'gyur// rkang lag 
243b5(rgyud 'grel): rdeb shing kha ni gya tshems smra// rtse 'jo rgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs// gcig la gcig gi mgul 'khyud lag kyang sbrel// thong du 'jug na spyod lam gzhan du 'chos// mi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di 
243b6(rgyud 'grel): dag ste// gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags// gzugs kyis rgyags shing mdud pa bor ba yin// grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun du rgyu// de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs// glu dang gro gar 
243b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rol mo dang // zho tsheng lhag par byed cing rab tu brtson// bdung ba dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor// mi rigs brtson pas springs yig bskur bar byed// dam tshig de bzhin spyod lam btang nas ni// 
243b8(rgyud 'grel): khyim pa dag dang sten cing dam bral nas// de dag dam tshig shin du log par gnas// las gang rdo rje 'chang gis rtag smad pa// srang dang tshad la ge yo spu byed pa dang // de 'dra'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas 
244a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'gro/ dung dang gser dang nor mang dang // khyim dang gnyen bshes rnams spangs dkyil 'khor zhugs// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la nges byung nas// 
244a2(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par byed// nor dang 'brul snying por 'du shes shing // bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags// gang la rnal 'byor nan tan med pa rnams// de dag gis kyang ci phyir
244a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zhugs// ngaso ni sngon che rnal 'byor spyod pa na// lus dang srog la rab tu ma bltas par// nga yis ting 'dzin bzhi pa 'di btsal na// de dag de tshe 'di thos pad+mos 'debs// bzod pa spangs 
244a4(rgyud 'grel): nas rab tu spros par byed// rnal 'byor spyod pa nged yin tshig tu smra// dam tshig nyams la byang chub ga la yod// dam tshig dral nas byang chub 'di thob pa// ngas ni ma thos nam yang yong ma mthong // shes rab 
244a5(rgyud 'grel): dman zhing yon tan rab spangs pa// rgyud chen mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu brjod// 'tsho ba med pa mang po rnal 'byor byed// sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa kun mi 'dod// byis pa de dag brtag tu lta la chags//

244a7(rgyud 'grel): su brnyas par 'gyur// gang yang shin tu dam dral sems ldan dang // mi bzad ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa// dam tshig ma yin spyod cing 'thab la dga'// de dag de yi dus na rtsod par 'gyur// yang dag

244b1(rgyud 'grel): par byed// cod pan rdo rje dril bu sogs// mgo la lag pas rab tu 'dzin// de rjes de ni 'tsho ba sgrub// kha cig slob ma'i tshogs sdud cing / nga yi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/ yin zhes zer zhing byis pa 'jig/ 
244b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba log par rab tu ston// kha cig pas mthar rab 'khod cing // bdag med shes rab pha rol phyin// skad cig tsam yang mi gnas par// 'jig rten sngags sogs sgrub par byed// kha cig slong/

244b4(rgyud 'grel): mo phal ming dang // rgod cing rab tu rtse bar byed// kha cig rol mo zlos gar dang // glu dang rgyan po 'gyed byed dang // 'dus pa'i tshogs la lta byed cing // gzo yi gnas rnams rab tu slob// kha cig tshong dang

244b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen dag/ phan tshun mtshon gyis rab tu 'debs// legs par gsungs pa'i 'dul ba la// rab tu mi gnas srung mi byed// sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan sun 'byin cing // phos pham la sogs rab tu byed// 
244b7(rgyud 'grel): gang gis btung ba'i mchog mi shes// sA lu la sogs bcos sbyar ba'i// myos pa'i khu ba 'thung byed cing // de yis phung grol rab tu bskyed// gang dag tha snyad tsam cig la// brten te mi dge'i las bcu 
244b8(rgyud 'grel): spyod// de dag 'gro ba ci 'dra ba// 'dren pa yis kyang ga la rtogs zhes 'byung ngo // gzhan yang seng ge la dper bzhag pa ni don 'thun pa mang du yod de/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ni 'khor ba ma rtogs pa'i 
245a1(rgyud 'grel): dus na yang // rang bzhin gyis mthu dang ldan pa dang // byang chub kyi sems rtogs shing skyes ma thag tu gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i mthu dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems goms pa mthar phyin

245b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs// gnad kyi man ngag gang la goms byas kyang // slu ba med de yang dag la ma yin no// mi shes mi gnas mnyam pa nyid kyi klong // dus rnams kun shes re dogs med pa'i blo// mthar thug don gyi dgodra// 
245b6(rgyud 'grel): pa de yin te// thig le chen po yi ge med pa'i lha// bskal pa du mar dge tshogs spyad pa'i mthus// byang chub sems kyi gdams ngag 'di thos na// rin chen rdo las bdud rtsi'i chu 'byung bzhin// dang ma'i ma 
245b7(rgyud 'grel): ma sems kyi gting nas 'byung // ngang pa'i cho gas ni mkha' la kun tu rgyu// gang la mdas phog de ni sa la ltung // bus pa bde 'dod brdzun pa'i yul la rgyag/ man ngag mtshon pog rnal 'byor shi dang 'dra// 'jig 
245b8(rgyud 'grel): rten byed spyod khe dang grags pa kun// rmi lam brag ca'i sa dang 'drar gzigs nas// chags med thugs rje don dam klong na 'phyo// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig a ba d+hU tI yin// rang bzhin stong pa stong pas rnam dbyen 
246a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// rtog pa'i gang zag chad pa'i lam gyis 'jigs// bde ba'i thang la mi shes mgon po'i tshogs// mtshan mo rgya ba g.yas sogs dgos par ldan// srid pa'i glang chen 'khrul pa kun 
246a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom nas// rtog med ldan grub dus gsum mnyam pa'i rdzing // rig pa'i seng ge rang srog de ru 'dor// rang rlung rdul gyis bdag med sgra chen sgrogs// ji ltar chu ni me yi gnyen po ste// rgya mtsho'i chu 'khor dag 
246a3(rgyud 'grel): las me yang 'bar// de ltar spyi med skye ba'i gnyen po ste// ma sres chos la sgra 'phrul dra ba 'byung // de lta'i don la skye ba yod dam med// thub la gzhan don mdzad de mngon te min// sbubs ma las 'das rnam pa

246a6(rgyud 'grel): ni brtan gyis g.yo ma byed// don 'di thub dbang spyod yul lo zhes pa dang // yang rgyad las ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams na// kun la rtag par mi gnas pa// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la// gsang/ 
246a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags mgon po mi gnas so// ji ltar dngos rnams nam mkha' la// gnas shing rtag tu rnam snang yang // de ni gnas su mi 'gyur ba// gsang sngags mgon po'ang de bzhin ni// nam mkha' dus gsum la 
246a8(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang // ji ltar bral bar 'dod pa bzhin// de ltar gsang sngags mgon po yang // dus gsum med kyang rnam par snang // ming tsam du ni gdags pa'i gnas// byed pa po la sogs dang bral// nam 
246b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la ni tha snyad du// mkhas pa rnams ni 'dogs par byed// ming ma gtogs pa cung zad kyang // yod pa ma yin nam mkha' bzhin// de bzhin gsang sngags dbang phyug kyang // tha snyad tsam du snang bar zad// / 
246b2(rgyud 'grel): me dang chu dang rlung ma yin// sa dang nyi ma 'ang ma yanI zhing // zla ba la sogs gza' kun min// nyin par ma yin mtshan mo'ang min// skye ba ma yin 'gag pa'ang min// 'chi ba dang ni rgud pa'ang min// skad cig// 
246b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin yud tsam min// lo la sogs pa'ang ma yin zhing // 'jig pa dang ni 'chags pa'ang min// bskal pa'i grangs kyang yod ma yin// dge dang mi dge las byung ba'i// dbus su yod pa'ang ma yin no// /
